Use Ice Bear's awesome cooking skills to serve up some delicious dishes in Stirfry Stunts!

This app is only available in English. Don't worry. It's super fun and doesn't have much text. Have fun!

GRILLIN' AND CHILLIN'
Working the grill at a teppanyaki restaurant is no easy task. You've got to juggle ingredients and orders to satisfy a nonstop rush of hungry customers. Luckily, Ice Bear is the coolest chef around. With him manning the spatulas, everybody will leave happy!

MAKE MAGNIFICENT MEALS
Unlock new foods like shrimp, scallops and lobster to cook your culinary masterpiece. Use more exotic ingredients to increase your multipliers and really rack up the points.

GET HELP FROM YOUR BROS
Call on Grizz and Panda to distract your customers with a little song and dance, giving you more time to perfect your recipes.

BECOME A GRILLMASTER
Upgrade your grill and plates to give you more room to work. Pull out tricks like the classic onion volcano to boost your score sky high.

Get ready to cook up a storm with Ice Bear in STIRFRY STUNTS!

descriptionHTML:
You will really feel like you are behind the wheel of a car. Explore the city, and perhaps you will find something interesting.
You have a 360-degree view of the cabin. Fun companions are waiting for you to join them in the game.
Set up a race according to your own rules! Turn on the music and let's go!!!!

Tips:
1. Do not speed. Drive carefully in order to avoid crashing or damaging your car.
2. Pay attention to the interactive hints.
3. Don't forget to fill up your car with gas at the gas station.
4. For your convenience, please keep the doors locked when driving.

Please note: The input area for the interactive buttons is around the center of the screen. The side areas with the control buttons are inactive.
To successfully activate the interactive parts of the game, you must first drag the component of interest to the center of the screen while in 360-degree mode. Press to confirm your selection.

***Game features:***
- Fun interactive game with endless replay value.
- Different missions for different cars.

comments: I've tried about most of the bowling games on line and none compare with this one.  I almost had a perfect 300 game but for 1 spare frame.  You can back off the foul line and really speed the ball for a perfect strike.  None of the others can do that!  Love it.  One change please, put the high score function back into play. Finally got my 1st perfect 300 game and no one witnessed it!  🤗😠👍

This is a nice bowling game that works beautifully on my 10" tablet.  The ball can be rolled slow or very fast.  The pins act as if they're very light weight.  This is a good game for beginners or anyone who just wants to bowl a quick, satisfying game. Aiming the ball is easy. I like the fact that this game connects to Google Play Games.  The ball can appear a darker color if pulled back toward you too far. Check out the ball with the hand imprint or the one with the spider.  If I could recommend one update, it would be to update the year (2014 bugs me) and prevent the ball from being snagged up by the thin black line.  Also, please relay my score rather than telling me to wait until a friend plays for comparison.

Ultimate bowling 2014 This is by far one of the better bowling games I have ran across in very long time. You have more choices when it comes to the bowling balls, better control of the ball as you are sending it down the lane, I could go on but the one thing I would like to see change would be for you to show the pins like they do in real bowling that have gone down on your first shot like off to the side somewhere. This would make it even more realistic, otherwise I can't find a thing wrong so far with the game..hope you enjoy

Used to be better It nags you to death about installing Google Games, as if it won't run right without it (runs fine). Then if you install it it nags you to login. All this so that you can do stuff I have no interest in, like posting your scores online.  Allow us to turn off the nagging, please. This is the best bowling app I've seen, which is a sad statement about the quality of bowling apps. Unrealistic physics for the pin action that make it impossible to ever do a split. No way to impart a spin on the ball.

REAL BOWLING!!!!! Wow finally found a good no frills bowling game! The ball movement is wonderful! You can get it to do all kinds of things. I can launch it like a missile or granny roll and even throw yes throw!!!! IT HAVE FUN if I could give it ten stars I would.
Best bowling game on the app store There are so many games with all this unneeded nonsense, you have no idea how hard it is to find a bowling game where you just roll a ball at pins.

comments: Bowls bowling 3D It's a terrific game, fun and skill in deed! One recommendation; have more head to head without having to bet any coins. Betting for some reason slows the game and puts the players in a defensive position when ranked in a lessor tier. It's fun just to play and find people who also just want to have fun without that betting pressure. Make it more friendly, so the players can compete w each other not only to win coins! Please!

1 star as the game stands at the moment. There is an exploitable cheat mode where a player can make the opening shot very short  against a nearby part of the pier. Once that is done the second player cannot make a shot.  This is used far too often by cheating players.  Sort this and the game is playable.

A play mode which would follow  miniature  golf  a little  with small  elevation changes , off camber spots , obstacles  jump water , ramp threw tire. Different  playing fields like open parks with bench seats and walking stones for Hazzard.  The pier is cool to play on ,put some open knot holes on it for Hazzard. Multiple  modes to choose  from. The strait up mode is nice ...  but could  be better.  I like world league  it's a blast  and I'm doing very well in it. I gave you a 4star  app plays smooth  and the game itself  is fun. I'll be waiting for the upgrades.

TONY Revised from 2 stars to 4 stars as this as said before is an excellent game would have been 5 stars if it was not for the fact the top 10 or so players have a way to cheat without playing a game. So annoying and unfair. I suggest blanket the top 20 or so players to the same prize or find a way to stop them. Cheers for a great game though

Marc This game has made a big improvement since I last uninstalled. The is however a major glitch. When the Jack goes in the water it is replaced back where it started. This allows the leading player a massive advantage as all they need to do is pin the jack and will never lose an end, if the Jack is shot out please either play a dead end or put the Jack in the middle. More experienced players play the Jack to the side every time because they know they will win the end. Alternatively put a barrier in.

Fairly addictive I've grown to love this game. The gameplay is pretty smooth, with just an occasional hiccup. My one gripe is that it can take a while for the game to find you someone to play! By the way, how do you get into Season 3?

description: Dog Town is a FREE pet caring simulation game where you can collect dog cards and dogs like: basset hound, Staffordshire Bull Terrier, Springer Spaniel, Boston Terrier, Labrador Retriever, Australian Shepherd, Yorkshire Terrier, Bull Terrier, Great Dane, Shnauzer, Cocker Spaniel, French Bulldog, Pomeranian, Doberman, Siberian Husky, Miniature Pinscher, Labrador, Beagle, Chihuahua, Corgi, Dachshund and other dog breeds with a large emphasis on Dog Collection and management for casual and midcore players. Players will collect dogs, train them to level them up and send them to quests for exciting in-game rewards! If you always wanted to adopt a pet, play with puppies was interested in pet rescue this is one of the best pet games for you. With the ability to customize the rooms where their dogs will live we've put tremendous amount of effort to ensure that players would feel attached to their dogs just like they would to the real ones.In coming updates we will bring more dog cards for cute puppies and dogs to groom and breed like Dachshund, Corgi , Chihuahua, Labrador, Beagle, Miniature Pinscher, Siberian Husky, Doberman, Pomeranian, French Bulldog, Cocker Spaniel, Shnauzer, Great Dane, Bull Terrier, Yorkshire Terrier, Australian Shepherd, Labrador Retriever, Boston Terrier, Springer Spaniel, Staffordshire Bull Terrier, basset hound and many others puppies! Each dog will have a unique character and behavior, so players will always recognize their "Sleepy" from the "Jumpy"! And what's better is that the game is in full 3D and a planned VR support coming in future updates will ensure that the immersion to the Dog Town is always at high levels!Start collecting your dogs now and show your own collection to the world!FEATURES★ Gorgeous 3D environment! ★ Realistic Dogs with lifelike behavior! ★ Breed and groom your own Dog Collection!★ Level up your dogs and send them to quests!★ Decorate your rooms with hundreds of decorations!★ More than 60 dogs to collect and more to come!PLEASE NOTE!This game is still in early development.And a network connection is required.UPCOMING FEATURES● Interaction with the dogs● Translation (German, Russian, Spanish, Portuguese and few more)● More dogs and decorations● Backyard / Minigames ● Dog dressup and competition with friendsUpcoming dog breeds: basset hound, Dachshund, Staffordshire Bull Terrier, Chihuahua, Corgi, Labrador, Beagle, Springer Spaniel, Miniature Pinscher, Boston Terrier, Labrador Retriever, Siberian Husky, Australian Shepherd, Yorkshire Terrier, Doberman,  Bull Terrier, Pomeranian,  Great Dane, Shnauzer, French Bulldog,  Cocker Spaniel and other dogs.Best dog simulation and pet rescue game ever!If you are having any problems in the game or have a great idea about it please contact gamesupport@frismos.com

description: Switch your car to the boat, jet or even a windsurfing board in this new Jet Racing game! Choose your ride and guide it to the finish line! Control your ship with just one finger and see how it flips, jumps and dives on it's way. This game can be played by the whole family! Invite your family and play together!Prepare for a race by picking one of the fast sailing rides! Gain enough speed to jump over the ramps or dive deep into the ocean. You will love all the surprises in each level (you can even meet dolphins here)! There are also plenty of coins to collect for better results while sailing for the win! Lets start the engine or catch the wind and swim to the finish in the shortest time possible! The controls are so simple that anyone can play this game without any problems!The levels are designed so that you would do many stunts on the run, the ship will spin doing flips - but watch out not to land on the roof! You will quickly learn that this speed jet boat game is crazy and full of laugh-generating moments. Try yourself!

comments: Great, but.... By FAR the best table tennis game I have played so far. The gameplay is great. The controls are responsive,  but do occasionaly respond erratically. Graphics are fine. Nice to see a TT game where u see the player, not just a bat. My main issue is with the additional skills that can be earned. It seems incredibly difficult, and I'm still on my first skill. I thought it's just me not being very good, but I've seen another review which also mentions this issue, so maybe it is genuinely very hard. Too hard.

Good game, the best ping pong game out there that I have tried. A few things that could be better. 1. Positioning. Even when I play with opponents of less skill and worse equipment, sometimes I get my player positioned at the edge of the table, while the opponent is always towards the middle, even if I play the ball to the side. Then I get a ball at the opposite side and  lose the point. 2. Multiplayer lags A LOT. 3. You could show timer to have better control. 4. Backhand service option. 5. Include spins.

Good but need a bit of improvement Great game I'm enjoying it but it often hangs on my Xiaomi Redmi Note 3S. Also if we had the ability to move the players it would be even more challenging and enjoyable. I've lost a lot of points because the ball was far away and the player wouldn't move. Other than that it's a great game and I play it everyday.

Very good game! Game, sometimes, work's in slow-motion mode when you are playing online games. Also, often, game blocks when you are starting the match or trying to read the online leader board. And last but not least, it needs a lot of time to find opponent for online game. All in all, nice game but it needs some improvement. :) Best regards to all the players!

I must say for someone who rarely plays any games anymore, this game has decent consistent real life ping pong Characteristics! Do you ever notice when you type in Ping Pong it usually has Table Tennis. One point to add is that one must wait to long in between matches, Why should I have to wait?

Fun! Enjoying the game so far. Good graphics & not to hard to just play. The - now. The gold coins are VERY slow to earn! Equipment is kinda $$ for the small amount earned. I KNOW they have to support themselves to continue to improve. Bottom Line...  it's worth the download,so far. Good luck all!

comments: This game is awful!!! I was helping my sister-a Pre-K school teacher- find a suitable app for for her students to learn their ABC's and this is one of the apps I checked out for her. She downloaded the app and the next day, she showed this to her students and let a few of them try it and none of them could comprehend the directions it has to make each letter. When the kids went home crying because they failed at writing the letter A, seven parents complained to my sister and it got her fired from her job. Highly recommend to NOT DOWNLOAD. Terrible app.

descriptionHTML:
Maze Craft is a simulation game that brings the classic labyrinth into a whole 3D world !
Explore and find a way out of infinte amazing labyrinths.
Climb to the top of pyramid and look down to see the exit point.
Check how fast you can reach the end with Super hero style character !
If you are fan of games like retro-pixel style you will definitely like this one.

FEATURES

▶ MULTIPLAY available
Compete with worldwide person in online connection and prove that you are the most Maze Hero of them all !
Enjoy this amazing labyrinth game with everybody in the world !

▶ TONS OF PIXEL HEROES
Collect proper amount of gems and open new characters. You have 30 new hero charaters to choose.

▶ REAL 3D MAZE

Maze Craft has a unlimited level that randomly generates a new maze every time you play.
There are several types of pixel block-sets all lovingly-crafted in a lush, retro-painted style : Ice, Vocano, Glass, Desert and so forth

▶ EASY CONTROL
Simple controls and short game play sessions let you play anywhere, anytime!
High-End 3D quality performance with low capacity storage (under 50MB).
You can jump and see what’s happenning far away and look around while in game, as well as aim your character only with your finger movement

description: Have you ever wanted to be a Winx fairy and race through beautiful 3D underwater? Now you can! Winx Sirenix Power lets you swimming through Infinite Ocean, taken straight from the 5th Season of Winx Club! Swim through Pillar of Control as your favorite fairy, and gather as many hearts as you can before the time runs out! Race against Tritannus through the reefs and caves, and avoid spells cast by the Trix! Once you complete your training, you’ll be ready to take on Tritannus with super-powerful spells! Save the Selkies today before Tritannus captures them, and stop him from polluting the Infinite Ocean! Features: - Play as your favourite fairy: Bloom, Stella, Flora, Aisha, Musa or Tecna! - Race through 4 different tracks: Infinite Ocean, Shark Eye Mountain, Pillar of -Control and Pillar of Balance, all taken from the TV show! - Spells, shields and Sirenix Power to boost your speed, protection and invincibility! - Rock through 3D underwater with TV songs and soundtracks - 16 levels of game play - Choice of tilt or joystick control Great value packs: - Gamer Pack: play as Stella, and swim through Shark Eye Mountain! - Fairy Pack: play as Stella and Flora! - Princess Pack: play as Aisha and Musa! - Super Fairy Pack: get four of your favourite fairies for one great price! - Twin Track Pack: get Pillar of Control and Shark Eye Mountain in one pack! - Ultimate Pack: Unlock all in one bargain price! description: We are a third-party developer and we do not claim for the Minecraft and MCPE trademarks. We use these trademarks from permission of the Mojang AB company. The Mojang AB company registered and owns them. We observe a policy of use - account.mojang.com/terms, minecraft.net/brand-guidelinesDo you want to play cops and criminals or go to MCPE prison?This map is a simulator of the most real prison where you have the right to choose how you want to play, for which team, etc. But on this game- this is not the only attraction, there is also a dining room, a forest, a lake and a village. Uncover the keyhole of the prison walls and adventures in it with Prison!In this role-playing multiplayer game there are many police cars: black with flashing lights, everything is as it should be. Hard-to-manage horses are also at your disposal. Imagine that you are a real cop. Or maybe on this multiplayer role-playing map MCPE you prefer to be a criminal and make an escape. Since the game is role-playing and multiplayer, invite friends, divide into teams and choose who will be the cop, and who will make an escape in the sandbox of Minecraft. Become a participant in criminal adventures.Multiplayer role-playing Minecraft map - 3in1: crime, escape, adventure!THE INSTRUCTION HOW TO INSTALL MAPS FOR MCPE1) Download free of charge application2) Open an installer3) Install maps4) Select maps from settings of resources of Minecraft Pocket Edition
